definition: to circle/to go back/to turn around/to answer/to return/to revolve/Hui ethnic group (Chinese Muslims)/time/classifier for acts of a play/section or chapter (of a classic book)
to look after/to take into consideration/to attend to
to spread out/to open up/to exhibit/to put into effect/to postpone/to prolong/exhibition

sentences.english: The Bibliothèque nationale de France in Paris organizes a retrospective of his graphic work.
sentences.chinese: 法国国家图书馆为他的绘画作品举办了个人回顾展。

sentences.english: In 2011, the National Museum of Art, Osaka will present a Moriyama retrospective exhibition.
sentences.chinese: 年，大阪国立美术馆将举办森山大道回顾展。

sentences.english: A new Tate retrospective wants to make us look again
sentences.chinese: 泰特美术馆最新的一个回顾展希望我们再次回眸。

definition: to spread out/to open up/to exhibit/to put into effect/to postpone/to prolong/exhibition
Ai Weiwei (1957-), Chinese artist active in architecture, photography, film, as well as cultural criticism and political activism
Cai Guoqiang (1957-), contemporary Chinese artist working with firework displays and light shows
to put on display/to be on show/to exhibit
